member.name: ID3D12VideoEncodeCommandList1.ExecuteExtensionCommand
member.summary: Records a command to execute a video extension command into an encode command list.
member.param: Pointer to an representing the video extension command to execute. The caller is responsible for maintaining object lifetime until command execution is complete.

A pointer to the execution parameters structure, which is defined by the command. The parameters structure must match the parameters enumerated by a call to with the feature value of and a parameter stage value of .
The size of the pExecutionParameters parameter structure, in bytes.

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncodeCommandList1.InitializeExtensionCommand
member.summary: Records a command to initializes or re-initializes a video extension command into a video encode command list.
member.param: Pointer to an representing the video extension command to initialize. The caller is responsible for maintaining object lifetime until command execution is complete.

A pointer to the creation parameters structure, which is defined by the command. The parameters structure must match the parameters enumerated by a call to with the feature value of and a parameter stage value of .
The size of the pInitializationParameters parameter structure, in bytes.

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncodeCommandList1
member.summary: Encapsulates a list of graphics commands for video decoding. This interface inherits from and adds support for video extension commands.
